items.label: ex-radial-fitness
items.title: Radially Symmetric Fitness Landscapes
items.content:
467: :class: tip
468: 
469: Consider a reward of the form:
470: 
471: $$
472: R(x, v) = f(\|x\|, \|v\|)
473: 
474: $$
475: 
476: on the ball $\mathcal{X}_{\text{valid}} = \{x : \|x\| \le R_0\}$. This system has **full $SO(d)$ rotational symmetry**.

472: R(x, v) = f(\|x\|, \|v\|)
473: 
474: $$
475: 
476: on the ball $\mathcal{X}_{\text{valid}} = \{x : \|x\| \le R_0\}$. This system has **full $SO(d)$ rotational symmetry**.
